TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICallbackContainer

summary.span: 定義方法，以允許控制項取得回呼指令碼。

span.span: Defines a method that enables controls to obtain a callback script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可實作介面提供的指令碼，將會起始回呼伺服器使用的控制項。Classes that implement the interface provide controls with a script that will initiate a callback to the server. 回呼與更常見的回傳的網頁處理回呼的資料重新建立頁面，而不需要變更頁面所保留的狀態資訊。A callback differs from the more common postback in that the page processing for the callback recreates the page without changing state information held by the page. 如需有關建立回呼的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作用戶端回呼而不回傳](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information on creating callbacks, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). 類別可實作也應該實作介面介面，以處理控制項所引發的事件。Classes that implement the interface should also implement the interface to handle the events raised by controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetCallbackScript (System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl buttonControl, string argument);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetCallbackScript(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl buttonControl, string argument) cil managed
Public Function GetCallbackScript (buttonControl As IButtonControl, argument As String) As String

param.name: buttonControl
param.span: 啟始回呼要求的控制項。

span.span: The control initiating the callback request.

param.name: argument
param.span: 用來建置回呼指令碼的引數。

span.span: The arguments used to build the callback script.

summary.span: 建立指令碼，對 Web 伺服器啟始用戶端回呼。

span.span: Creates a script for initiating a client callback to a Web server.

returns.span: 指令碼，在用戶端上執行時，將對 Web 伺服器啟始回呼。

span.span: A script that, when run on a client, will initiate a callback to the Web server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法應傳回執行的指令碼，當在用戶端，將會起始回撥到 Web 伺服器。Implementations of the method should return a script that, when run on the client, will initiate a callback to the Web server. `argument`參數傳遞至處理回呼的方法。The `argument` parameter is passed to the method that handles the callback. 如需有關建立回呼的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作用戶端回呼而不回傳](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information on creating callbacks, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185).
